video_description: Prestigio Multipad PMP5080B Tablet - GAMES. The Prestigio Multipad PMP5080B is a 8" tablet with a capacitive multi- touchscreen (800x600) running Android 2.3 on a Rockchip RK2918 SoC. A extensive review can be found at Notebookcheck.com (DE) and Notebookcheck.net (EN).
title: Prestigio Multipad PMP5080B Tablet - GAMES
